modName: Simplified Skyrim Main Menu Wallpaper Replacers
summary: This mod is rather a simple one - it will replace the the black menu screen and the Skyrim symbol/logo, with your choice of one of 20 \"Simplified\" screenshots.
descriptionHtml:
Simplified Skyrim Main Menu Screen Replacers by insane0hflex (aka svaalbard on the Skyrim Nexus).

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25875-1-1350920457.jpg[/img]

[size=15][b]Description[/b][/size]

This mod is rather a simple one - it will replace the the black menu screen and the Skyrim symbol/logo, with a \"Simplified\" screenshot.

These are all screenshots I took that have been processed in Photoshop to have a painting like appearance, for a simple and visually pleasing look. 

These are not individually painted pieces of digital art.

In total - there are 20 different main menu replacers to choose from. Check out images tab for a preview of every main menu replacer. Also, feel free to submit me your screenshots if you want me to \"simplify\" it, and include it in the next release.



[size=15][b]How to Install[/b][/size]

1. Download, then extract simplified_skyrim_main_menu_wallpaper_replacers.zip to any location.

2. Open the simplified_skyrim_main_menu_wallpaper_replacers folder, and you\'ll see a DATA folder.

3. Copy paste the DATA folder to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

4. You might be asked to overwrite or merge files/folders, click yes to all.

5. Now, to choose a simplified main menu to replace the default one - the name of the folder is the general name/concept behind the screenshot. In the folder, there is also a \"preview\" image you can view to see if you like it or not.

6. Copy that file inside the folder, which is called mainmenuwallpaper.dds, and place it into:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\interface\\objects\\

7. If you are asked to replace whatever file that is (mainmenuwallpaper.dds), select yes if you wish to do so.

8. Start Skyrim and enjoy!

Also - I highly recommend to get No Loading Menu Smoke - removes the fog/smoke fx on loading screens and the main menu. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7901


[size=15][b]How to Uninstall[/b][/size]

1. Delete the mainmenuwallpaper.dds file in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\interface\\objects\\

2. Delete logo.nif in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\logo\\

[size=15][b]Credits and Thanks[/b][/size]

For hellstorm102 for the logo.nif (used with his permission).
For Dark0ne and all admins of the Nexus Network, for a great and easy to use website to share mods for Morrowind, Oblivion, and Skyrim.
author: insane0hflex aka svaalbard
